thread.title: Disney to create live sports, entertainment content for Twitter

title: Disney to create live sports, entertainment content for Twitter
text:
April 30, 2018 / 6:37 PM / Updated 32 minutes ago Disney to create live sports, entertainment content for Twitter Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
(Reuters) - Walt Disney Co will create live sports, news and entertainment programming specifically for Twitter Inc’s social media platform, the companies said in a statement on Monday. A screen shows the logo and a ticker symbol for The Walt Disney Company on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) in New York, U.S., December 14, 2017. REUTERS/Brendan McDermid - RC1277BFE810
Twitter and Disney’s ESPN sports networks will announce specific live shows later on Monday and on Wednesday when each presents upcoming programming to advertisers, the companies said. Reporting by Lisa Richwine in Los Angeles; Editing by Lisa Shumaker
